comments.body: If someone knows how to do this for real, I just don't know how to make sphinx templatize this file. I tried putting the `{{ pathto()... }}` stuff inside the js, and that did not work.

Perhaps the least obvious API of all time, passing the number `1` to `pathto` causes it to be a relative path to the web root. Note that this doesn't become relative if you start the path with `/`, though.
